feed.title: Undb Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Undb: v1.0.0-0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Merge main into develop branch by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1643
  • chore(deps): update dependency tailwind-merge to v2 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1644
  • chore(deps): update dependency bits-ui to ^0.9.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1646
  • fix(deps): update dependency mongoose to v8 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1648
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.291.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1647
  • fix(deps): update dependency p-limit to v5 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1649
  • fix: more specific error message for invalid api token by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1650
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.292.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1651
  • chore(deps): update dependency @swc/core to v1.3.96 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1652
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite-plugin-electron to ^0.15.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1654
  • fix(deps): update opentelemetry-js monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1655
  • fix(deps): update dependency @opentelemetry/auto-instrumentations-node to ^0.40.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1658
  • chore: up by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1659
  • feat: support sqlite memory mode by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1660
  • chore(deps): update dependency svelvet to v9 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1663
  • fix(deps): update dependency openapi-typescript to v7.0.0-next.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1664
  • chore(deps): update dependency svelte-jsoneditor to ^0.19.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1667
  • chore(deps): update swc monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1666
  • chore: upgrade dependencies by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1668
  • fix(deps): update dependency openapi-typescript to v7.0.0-next.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1669
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.293.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1670
  • fix(deps): update dependency passport to ^0.7.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1672
  • chore(deps): update dependency taze to ^0.13.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1677
  • fix(deps): update dependency got to v14 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1675
  • fix(deps): update dependency openapi-typescript to v7.0.0-next.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1673
  • chore(deps): update dependency @swc/core to v1.3.100 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1676
  • chore(deps): update dependency postcss-load-config to v5 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1678
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.294.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1674
  • chore(deps): update dependency bits-ui to ^0.10.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1679
  • chore(deps): update dependency electron to v28 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1681
  • fix(deps): update dependency p-map to v7 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1683
  • chore(deps): update dependency bits-ui to ^0.11.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1684

  • chore(deps): update dependency @swc/core to v1.3.101 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1697

  • fix(deps): update dependency openapi-typescript to v7.0.0-next.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1735

  • @B4rtware made their first contribution in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1696

Full Changelog: https://github.com/undb-io/undb/compare/v0.10.3...v1.0.0-0

entry.title: New release for Undb: v1.0.0-1

What's Changed

entry.content:
